questions.quote: Oh yeah, we don't want some jerk sitting in front of us, it'll be like, 'Hey, big head, can you move out of the way? I didn't pay a cover charge to stare at your bald spot.'
It was kinda fun.  You know, maybe his name really is J-O-H-N, but he changed it to J-O-N for show business. Well, you know, J-O-N is a lot zippier.
Well, once you were dead, we couldn't just sit on our hands.  We had to make a move...
Oh you wanna switch? I'm sleeping on a love seat. I've got my feet up in the air like I'm in a space capsule.
Have you noticed, people don't use straws as much as they used to for some reason.
Well, I started to tell her and then all of the sudden, for some reason, I just burst into tears.
So, George told me that you left the drink next to Dick's on purpose.
Look at the big baby!  Hehaha.  Hey, big baby, are you wetting yourself? Maybe it is time for you to be changed.  Hahah.
Or maybe he liked your gift so much, he decided to get me the same thing.  Perhaps it's an homage.
I'll tell ya where I got it. I got it from the guy you so callously refer to as the Soup Nazi.
